name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 8, Beijing. A lawyer posted a video saying, are all village heads hereditary now?
As more and more cases are taken, it is found that village heads in many parts of the country are hereditary. Today, I received a client from Hebei. The client said that their village head was killed due to a dispute, and the new village head is the son of the previous one.
The lawyer expressed doubts: Don’t villagers across the country have the right to exercise elections?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Melbourne, Australia, a Chinese student wrote on a piece of paper, "One China Principle, Taiwan is an indispensable part of China" and asked other students to hold up the paper and take a photo of the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 9, Guangzhou Metro Baiyun Dongping or Xialiang Station.
During the morning rush hour, Guangzhou citizens could not stand the long queues for security checks and chose to rush through the security checks collectively. The on-site security personnel and security guards were unable to stop them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that on the evening of the 9th, Guangzhou Metro has quietly cancelled the high-standard security check

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Guangzhou subway security inspector's contribution: 
Why he thinks subway security is useless, and their daily work:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 6, in Dachang Hui Autonomous County, Langfang, Hebei, a man drove head-on and refused to give way to an ambulance with flashing police lights, forcing the ambulance to reverse and give way.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 9th Police report: Administrative detention of the car owner

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen broke the news: The crocodile in Guangzhou Zoo was so hungry that it was skin and bones. If you didn't look carefully, you would think it was a specimen. On December 8, the zoo responded: It was caused by gastroenteritis and is being treated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: A group of young people clashed with knives at a music bar in Chifeng, Inner Mongolia. The knife-wielding man looked to be in his teens and cried at the end.
Afterwards, the floor of the restaurant was covered in blood.
It was said online that the victim's tendons were cut off

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Beijing netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Changchun Taxation Bureau sent a text message warning that there will be policy constraints for medical insurance discontinuation
For those who discontinue medical insurance payment, the reimbursement amount of major disease insurance will be reduced by 4,000 yuan for each year of discontinuation. If you fail to participate in the insurance within the period, the waiting period will be reset, and an additional 30 days of waiting period will be added for each additional year of discontinuation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 9, Guiyang, Guizhou. A man said in the group that he was 19 years old and was arranged by his uncle, a department-level cadre, to work in the Water Conservancy Bureau as deputy director of the office. The man also revealed that although he was only 19 years old, he enjoyed the same treatment as the regular staff, and said that he could be officially enrolled at the age of 23.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 10, Xinhua News Agency released a report on the "female master's degree student lost and 'taken in'" incident. The report mentioned that regarding the suspected rape, after investigation, it was found that the "taker" Zhang knew that Bu had a mental illness, but still had a relationship with her and gave birth to a child. He was suspected of committing a crime and has been taken criminal compulsory measures by the public security organs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 9, the media reported that from January to September, the number of Japanese restaurants closed down reached 650, and the Japanese restaurant industry is experiencing the largest wave of closures in 10 years.
The research data of the new media "Catering Boss Insider" showed that 1.05 million restaurants in China closed down in the first half of the year, which is close to the total number last year.
Netizens replied: "Can you report on the domestic closures?" "I don't know how many restaurants closed down in Shenzhen in nine months"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens discovered that the term "taking in" was used as early as 2013. In a program broadcast by Hunan TV in 2013, a 66-year-old man "took in" a 16-year-old mentally retarded girl and had a son with her. The girl wrote "I want to go home" all over the wall.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 10 (Released) Some netizens discovered that in the publicity of the winners of the 2024 May 1st Labor Medal, the three-year epidemic period was written as a "special period"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the 12th and 10th, Shandong (published IP). An old man was lying on the ground begging, which formed a sharp contrast with the welfare lottery sales station next to him.
The photo was deleted by the platform a few hours after it was posted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"People live worse than a tree"
As winter arrives, cities across the country put sweaters on the trees on the roadside
December 8, Zhumadian, Henan. A man had no thick clothes to wear and could only wrap his whole body with plastic bags to resist the cold.
Netizens responded to "People live worse than a tree" "Go count and take off a few clothes to survive the winter"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 9, a man used classical Chinese to describe the current social situation: Foreign enemies have not massacred us, but our own people are trying to kill us all...
I will not be able to close my eyes even if I die if I don't root you out...
The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 9, Hefei, Anhui. A Hui woman was exposed online for having ancestors who ate pork and did not believe in any religion. She was reported by a group from another province just because she shared her life on Douyin.
The Feixi County United Front Work Department called the woman back and said: The online discussion (whether Hui people can eat pork) hurt the feelings of other Hui people. You can eat pork, but don't post it online. Posting it online is illegal.
The staff also threatened the woman: Someone will come after you.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 10, the South Korean National Assembly passed a resolution calling for the prompt arrest of President Yoon Seok-yeol.
Han Dong-hoon, leader of the People's Power Party, held a press conference with Prime Minister Han Deok-soo on Sunday and said that Yoon Seok-yeol would no longer handle foreign affairs and other national affairs before leaving office early.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 4, Shenyang, Liaoning. Huawei retailer "Brother Liang" revealed: Our Huawei Mate 70 series sales this year are very bleak. Brother Liang believes that the reason is that ordinary people have no money, and Huawei's patriotic sentiments are gradually being exhausted in the market.
 The day after the video was released, the Huawei dealer wanted to stop supplying him and was interviewed by Huawei lawyers. In response, Liang Ge could only delete the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on December 10, men aged 18 or above must complete "military service registration", otherwise it will affect their college and job search.
The report said that military service registration does not necessarily require serving in the army. It is the work of the state to register and manage citizens of appropriate age in accordance with the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reported on December 9, four ministries jointly issued a notice: Ensure that zero-employment families are dynamically cleared! Employment assistance has a "combination punch"
Netizens replied "zero employment will be given a red code" "Seeing the four words dynamic clearing is chilling" "Being punched every day"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the Spring Festival approaches, many gyms in China are running away.
On December 9, the Beijing Chaoyang District Sports Bureau issued a risk warning: reminding consumers to choose fitness venues with good business conditions, read the terms carefully when signing a contract, do not trust verbal promises, and do not recharge too much at one time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Video 1: A man was imprisoned by the Syrian Assad regime for 40 years. When he was rescued, he had lost his memory and could only smile foolishly when he saw people. Rescuers are trying to identify him.
Video 2: A prisoner held by the Assad regime in the dungeon of the Sednaya Prison in Damascus was mentally ill when he was found.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 10, it was revealed online that OCBC Bank in Singapore has begun to clean up users living outside of Singapore.
Some users reported receiving emails from the bank, which required users to provide their Singapore address to the bank offline before December 15, or to use an OCBC bank account to designate your Singapore salary deposit account.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 4, in Zhongshan, Guangdong, a netizen posted a video saying that the village committee required the installation of isolation columns at the door, otherwise the power would be cut off.
Netizens in the comment area said that in addition to Zhongshan City, Shunde District of Foshan also wanted to install them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @torontobigface well deserved

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added, full text of the video

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, netizens in Guangdong reported that almost overnight, concrete piers or crash barriers were installed at the entrances of primary and secondary schools in Chaozhou, Huizhou, Zhongshan and Foshan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Nvidia responded to the antitrust investigation: We will win by strength and are happy to answer any questions from regulators about our business.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 10, a fire broke out at Jiangxi University of Science and Technology.
However, after the fire, the school immediately notified all counselors to return to school to check dormitories and asked all students to delete photos and videos of the fire.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the "instant noodle price war" at the Shungeng Campus of Jinan University has caused heated discussions.
Netizens posted that a stall in the school cafeteria sells instant noodles for 3.5 yuan, and the school supermarket has also added this business, but the price is 10 yuan. The supermarket owner asked the cafeteria stall to raise the price together. After being rejected, the supermarket owner suspected that he used his connections to squeeze the owner of the cafeteria instant noodle stall out of the school.
Afterwards, the supermarket owner said that the price was reasonable and his son was a graduate student at Tsinghua University.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 9, Liaoning. A postgraduate entrance examination teacher posted a video saying: The West set a trap for us, asking us which is more important, the Party or the law in China? If you choose only one, you will fall into the trap of the West. This problem does not exist in China. The leadership of the Party and the rule of law are highly unified, neither conflicting nor contradictory. This triggered ridicule from netizens.
Netizens replied "Question: A or B Answer: or" "Win again, this job is not something that ordinary people can do"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Did Jiang Zemin and Zeng Qinghong plan to promote two people in charge?"
Wan Runnan said that at the CCP succession scene twelve years ago, the big men behind the scenes, Jiang Zemin and Zeng Qinghong, had the idea of "double succession", that is, Xi Jinping took over as general secretary and Bo Xilai took over as president. This top-level design of two people in charge was aborted in the end because of Bo Xilai's own reasons.
As a close friend of Hu Jintao in college, Wan Runnan also mentioned his speculation about Hu Jintao being carried out at the closing ceremony of the 20th National Congress.
Welcome to click to listen to the full version.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 9, a netizen drew Ding Jiayuan, an actor in the movie "Emergency Landing", in a live broadcast room. He was ridiculed by netizens because he looked like Hu Jintao.
Netizens responded in the live broadcast room: "It's all thanks to his peers" "Now elementary school students can do it too" "Ten miles of mountain road"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Guangzhou issued new regulations, and the contents such as "electric vehicles are limited to 15 kilometers" and "communication tools cannot be used in a handheld manner" have caused heated discussions.
The drafter of the new regulations responded: The purpose is to ensure the safety of riders and other practitioners.
Netizens replied "Expert leaders never ride electric vehicles" "Electric vehicles are limited to 15, so it is recommended that bicycles be limited to 5 and pedestrians be limited to 1"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Ma Fang, president of Taishan Management College, responded to the question "Is there any way to change the poor?" Ma Fang said that you need to face your true self bravely, "You know what you are, and basically you won't be too miserable" "If you are poor, just be happy, it's the end anyway, no matter what happens, it's still the end" "Don't be vain and have too high expectations of yourself"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that a slogan on the road in Shandong

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 6, Heilongjiang. A "Decision on Denial of Permission for Assembly, Parade and Demonstration by the 93rd Branch of the Reclamation Area Public Security Bureau" was circulated online. The decision stated that after review by our bureau, it was determined that the application for assembly, parade and demonstration submitted by Song Chuanbao would seriously disrupt social order and would not be permitted in accordance with the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 10, the U.S. Embassy in China released "Ambassador Burns' 2024 Human Rights Day Statement" on its WeChat official account. However, as of now, the U.S. Embassy in China's WeChat official account can no longer see this statement, and it is suspected to have been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 8 (Released) Fengqiu, Henan. A little boy pushed a mentally retarded old man into the icy river.
The person filming asked the boy why he didn't let the old man out.
The boy replied: "He is a fool, don't worry about him, I just want to freeze him to death" The boy also said that he knew the old man in the water.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Expert: There are about 900 million low-income people in China.
Li Shi, dean of the Institute of Sharing and Development at Zhejiang University, estimated that as of now, the number of people who have not reached the middle-income standard accounts for about 65% of the total population of the country, that is, there are about 900 million low-income people.
Li Shi pointed out that there is also a large gap in the income of these 900 million people. The income of some groups is close to the middle-income level, while the income of others is in a relatively poor state.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 6, Russia announced the results of a radiation survey on Japanese seafood. Russia tested samples of pollack and salmon caught in the Pacific Ocean for cesium 137 and strontium 190. The results showed that no excessive radiation was found. Subsequently, the Japanese seawater was tested and no excessive levels were found.
